definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (cf. Ar. zabdun gift; ? gift of ´[[י]], vid. Dr:Stud. Bib. i. 5 & reff.; perh. my gift, gift to me: cf. [[זַבְדִּיאֵל]]; in NH n.pr. [[זבדי]] ([[זַבְדִּי]] or [[זַבְדַּי]]?); NT Zebedai=ov, e.g. Mk 1:19, SyrVer zabday, Zebedee)—
grandfather of Achan, of Judah (LXX Zambr(e)i etc., LXXL Zabd(e)i) Jos 7:1 (app. = [[זִמְרִי]] 1Ch 2:6, LXX Zambr(e)i) v:1Ch 2:17, v:1Ch 2:18.
a Levite Ne 11:17 (om. B; A Zexri, LXXL Zexrei) prob. rd. [[זִכְרִי]], as ‖ 1Ch 9:15.
